modName: Jagged Bone Crown and Thalmor Clothes ReTexture with mesh re
summary: Jagged Bone Crown and Thalmor  boots, robes, and gloves ReTextured to Red and Black
descriptionHtml:
New added standalone version for bone crown.



First mod retexture, I upscaled them to 2048x2048 and changed colors. Bone Crown and Thalmor boots,robes, and gloves ReTextured to Red and Black. Left Old File Was little darker, had to brighten to get  female robes and gloves to match. Posted new pics with boots. 

Keep in mind pictures are in good lighting will be darker in game in most areas.
Uploading new pictures now.

Pictures without companion are the new version.

New version 1.0 

Fixed file path should install with manager now

Got some experience with gimp so i update them to HD and retextures them with a more red and black leather look. Left old versions if you like old better.

Post meshes to change the bone armor helm into jagged crown until editor comes out.


Other Mods 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3876 (Thalmor Robes red black in this mod)
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3939 (Thalmor recolor texture pack 8 versions.)



Special thanks.
Thanks God For Life.
Thanks to Reaper737 For encouragement to finish pack really wouldn\'t have done it other wise.

Sorry will not be updating this mod I give permission to someone to update this to a craftable as long they credit me for original mod.

[color=yellow][u][b]My other mods[/b][/u][/color]
[color=yellow][u][b]Draco1122[/b][/u][/color]
